explanation: The bug was in the palindrome check: [s[i]+s[j]][::-1] creates a list (containing the concatenated string) and then reverses that list, producing a list, so the code was comparing a string to a list which is always False. I changed that line to reverse the string itself by using (s[i]+s[j])[::-1], so the comparison correctly checks whether the concatenation is a palindrome.
